organized in into three clear systems
the first is redistribution markets
redistribution markets just like swapt
tree is when you take a used or

it's not needed to somewhere or
somewhere where it is they're
increasingly thought of as the fifth are
reduce reuse recycle repair and

Lifestyles this is the sharing and

one of my favorite examples of

so why don't you rent the drill or even
